TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicants were born in DATE . PERSON died in DATE . Mr Arapov lives in GPE . He decided to pursue the application of his late wife PERSON .
CARDINAL . From DATE to DATE the applicants received their old - age pensions , totalling CARDINAL and MONEY ( RUB ) per month , DATE in arrears .
CARDINAL . On DATE each applicant lodged an action against ORG of GPE for index - linking of their delayed pension payments in line with inflation .
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG of GPE granted the applicants ' claims and awarded the applicants RUB PERSON ( Mrs Arapova ) and RUB CARDINAL ( Mr Arapov ) . Both judgments came into force on DATE .
CARDINAL . ORG issued writs of execution and forwarded them to ORG of GPE for execution .
CARDINAL . NORP In DATE ORG returned the writs of execution to the applicants advising them to apply to the local office of ORG . The ORG refused to execute the judgments .
CARDINAL . In DATE the applicants applied to ORG on numerous occasions . ORG refused to accept the writs of execution because the defendant did not have funds .
CARDINAL . It was not before DATE that the writs of execution were accepted for payment by ORG of GPE .
CARDINAL . NORP The money awarded by the judgments was transferred to the applicants ' bank accounts on DATE , and received by the applicants on DATE .
